channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed set to cut interest rates in September, FOMC minutes show. Some even favored July move.
item.description: Most top Federal Reserve officials believed they should cut interest rates in September if inflation continued to slow and the labor market got any weaker.

item.title: Nonfarm payroll growth revised down by 818,000, Labor Department says
item.description: The U.S. economy created far fewer jobs than originally reported in the 12-month period through March 2024, the Labor Department reported.

item.title: Fed minutes point to ‚Äòlikely‚Äô rate cut coming in September
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday released minutes from its July 30-31 policy meeting.

item.title: B. Riley‚Äôs stock rallies on report of unit sale to Oaktree

item.title: Health-care marketplace Sesame to offer compounded versions of Wegovy through new $249 weight loss program
item.description: Sesame is offering compounded semaglutide ‚Äî the active ingredient in Wegovy and Ozempic ‚Äî to help users access obesity and diabetes treatments amid shortages.

item.title: Nonfarm payroll growth revised down by 818,000, Labor Department says
item.description: The U.S. economy created far fewer jobs than originally reported in the 12-month period through March 2024, the Labor Department reported.

item.title: So your college-bound kid is clueless about money: 5 tips to prepare them
item.description: College students today can find plenty of personal-finance tips online, but they might not know what information is trustworthy.

item.title: Bill Pascrell, longtime N.J. congressman and fierce Trump critic, dies at 87
item.description: The Democrat's four decades in rough-and-tumble New Jersey politics prepared him well for one of his most visible roles: Donald Trump antagonizer.

item.title: The Democratic playlist to nominate Harris: Lil Jon, Beyonc√©, Taylor Swift, Springsteen
item.description: The Democratic National Convention's roll call playlist to nominate Vice President Kamala Harris featured Lil Jon, Beyonc√©, Taylor Swift and Bruce Springsteen.

item.title: Kamala Harris backs Biden‚Äôs tax proposals ‚Äî including a tax on unrealized capital gains
item.description: Kamala Harris‚Äôs 2024 presidential campaign supports President Joe Biden‚Äôs economic proposals ‚Äî including one that would tax unrealized capital gains for those worth more than $100 million.

item.title: After mini-boom, weekly mortgage refinance demand falls back 15%. Here's why
item.description: Applications to refinance a home loan dropped 15% from the previous week, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association's seasonally adjusted index.

item.title: Why the latest mpox outbreak is raising alarm among health experts
item.description: The WHO's director for Europe, Dr. Hans Kluge, said Tuesday that the outbreak is "not the new Covid" and that it can be stopped with international cooperation.

item.title: A favored recession signal appears to be broken. Here‚Äôs what could change that.
item.description: The bond market is flashing a recession signal for a record period. But is it really broken?

item.title: Michelle Obama: Trump used 'misogynistic, racist lies' to 'try to make people fear us'
item.description: Michelle Obama drew explicit contrasts between Kamala Harris and Donald Trump.

item.title: Four bodies recovered in Sicily yacht wreckage as search for missing passengers continues
item.description: The ship was violently rocked by a storm around 4 a.m. local time Monday while it was anchored near the Sicilian port of Porticello.
